Package ai.statemachine

Interface HSMState

All Superinterfaces:
HSMBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
State, SubMachineState
public interface HSMState
extends HSMBase
The Interface HSMState. This interface just allows all classes that implement this interface to be the same base
